turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Good Morning! How are you doing today?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Morning, I am good how about yourself?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Oh I'm doing well, thank you very much. I wanted to ask you, have you heard about the charity Save The Children?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: No, I haven't what is it they do?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: It is an international non-governmental organisation that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: That sounds like a great thing they do

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Some of their most recent deeds include helping Rohingya Refugees and are still on the ground helping refugees  in Texas after the hurricanes. They are such a great charity that really puts their money towards their cause

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Those are great causes the children are who need the most help I think besides animals anyway

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Do you think this is something you could see yourself donating to?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: yes, I would donate what I could may not be much but every cent helps right?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Absolutely! I completely agree, I mean, we Turk for a reason right?! If the donation was to come out of your current earnings for this task, how much would you be willing to donate?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I'm sorry if it doesn't sound like much but I could donate 0.05 I'm trying to save for my cats surgery

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I'm so sorry to hear about your cat. I completely understand, I'm having a root canal done today, that will put me back at least $1100. Yay. But $.05 is great

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: you know you say 5 cents and feel a need to explain.... I wish I could do more really I feel so horrible for all the people who have lost everything in the recent natural disasters

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: If you could donate more, do you think this is a worthy cause to do so with?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I think it is well, if what they say is true and it all goes to kids ( you never know now days) kids are our future

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Is there anything specific you'd want your donation to go towards?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: If I had my choice I would start with donating towards the natural disasters like in Texas and then to education for kids, and well, food and a safe place to live, and then to other countries because you can't help other countries if your own nation is falling apart all by itself

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: In an ideal world, where we had all the monies, how much would you be willing to donate to a cause like this?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: In an ideal world, I would do better then donate I would help the people myself, I would go there and help them rebuild, or bring the supplies, or find them shelter..... if we had no concern about limited money I would give everything they needed.
